programme.title: The Last Hope
programme.desc: When the Ninjas' attempt to return Garmadon's 'Helmet of Darkness' to its perch at the Celestial Clock in order to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father from beginning fails, a Super Weapon is created that can destroy all of Ninjago. With the Overlord and Garmadon nearing completion of the Super-Weapon, Misako tells the group she thinks there could be one last chance at preventing Lloyd's final battle with his father. She believes if they can steal the helmet off Garmadon's head and return it to it's rightful perch on the Celestial Clock, it could stop the clock before it reaches zero, thus preventing the final battle from beginning. Dressed as Warriors, the Ninja escort their 'captive' Misako to Garmadon, and the heroes see glimpses of the Super-Weapon being built. In a thrilling escape, Misako cleverly steals Garmadon's helmet, and they race to the Celestial Clock. Lloyd has a brief encounter with his father, and hesitates striking him. When they return the helmet to its rightful perch, they're one second too late, allowing the clock to reach zero, and for it to focus a beam of concentrated light from the sky into the Super-Weapon. Nya is taken hostage, as the others fall off a cliff, barely surviving the fall. The Ninja have failed -- the final battle has begun.

programme.title: Thunderstox - Episode 303
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox encounters the sculptor. He helps unleash a horde of fierce garden gnomes on Knighton. What will the NEXO KNIGHTS do against this new enemy? Will their new COMBO NEXO Powers do the trick? As Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox head off on the Evil Mobile to 'store' the Forbidden Power in a secret location, they encounter...THE SCULPTOR. His real name is ROBERTO ARNOLDI. He's a sensitive and odd artist who has been laid off by the king (the King ordered a "smashing" statue of the Queen, and the Sculptor made a statue of the Queen literally smashing monsters. He takes everything very literally.) Jestro instructs him to make a "bad" statue that he can use to attack the knights. The Sculptor sets to work. Meanwhile, the NEXO KNIGHTS are discussing the COMBO NEXO Powers, the Forbidden Powers, and what all this means. Lance, meanwhile, decides that since his talk show career is on hold, he thinks he'll install cameras in the Fortrex and do a Big Brother-like expose show on the Knights (he decides NOT to tell the others.) Merlok 2.0 and the Cloud of Monstrox (each talking to their cohorts) explain the history of the Forbidden Powers: it's a history lesson about the WIZARDS' COUNCIL, the Forbidden Powers, and how they were stopped long ago. This visual montage leads Jestro to...MOUNT THUNDERSTROX. The Cloud of Monstrox shows him the circle of ten Standing Stones where he will insert the Forbidden Powers. "What'll happen after that?" asks Jestro, curious. "Oh, I don't want to spoil the surprise," says the Cloud. They insert the first Forbidden Power, Relentless Rust, and it locks into place on its stone. They go off to battle the Knights and collect the "bad" statue the sculptor is making. But he's made a literally bad statue...it's terrible ... garden gnomes. Like an amateur art student. And...it's not even finished. ("You can't rush bad genius!") The Knights attack with their newly modified vehicles and they succeed in destroying the Evil Mobile. They then try to use a COMBO NEXO Power, but can't...it had to be perfect to work (Ava and Merlok need to work on it.) As Jestro and the Cloud retreat, Merlok again talks to Clay about turning to stone! Merlok calls in Robin...he will need him to build something to help Clay as he becomes more and more impaired.

programme.title: Return Of The Overlord
programme.desc: When Garmadon uses his new Super-Weapon to turn Jamakai Village evil, he unwittingly unsettles the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possesses his body. Lord Garmadon witnesses the Super-Weapon come to life, revealing it to be 'Garma-Tron', a giant moving cannon. His first test subject is Nya. Meanwhile, the heroes prepare for the final battle and sneak-attack Garmadon's compound...only to find it empty. The Super-Weapon is moving towards the coastline, where the cannon's range can reach Ninjago. On the way there, the Ninja must face off with Evil Nya, turned dark from the Super-Weapon. On the coastline, Lloyd battles his father atop Garma-Tron. The battle is fierce, but Lloyd fails at stopping his father from firing Garma-Tron, turning Jamanakai Village evil. Garmadon naively celebrates, not realizing he's undone the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possess his body. And as the Overlord continues to get more powerful, a hideous metamorphosis is taking place. Lloyd must fight the Overlord, and just when it looks like good will prevail, Lloyd is injured and thrown to the ground. In the end, the villains escape through a portal to Ninjago, and our heroes are abandoned on the island with no way home. And with the Green Ninja injured, it looks like all is lost. Evil has won.

programme.title: Rotten Luck - Episode 304
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox unleashes the Forbidden Power Ravaging Rot on Knighton! Turning everything into green gooey rot. But Robin has an awesome new invention that could help the NEXO KNIGHTS Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find a second Forbidden Power near the falling down Swamp Castle: RAVAGING ROT. With this power, they can make everything in the kingdom rot - food, vegetation, anything that grows or is natural. And that's exactly what they do! It's awful and makes everything stink. The Sculptor start to sculpt a portable HeadQuarter for his master, Jestro. Jestro expects it to be done when they return from ravaging the land. Axl is very concerned - he's into organic food ... and now food starts to rot. Merlok 2.0 and Ava are continuing to work on perfecting the COMBO NEXO Powers. We see display screens of MANY of the NEXO Powers. But there's a huge power consumption issue with these new-fangled combos. "I'll have to find an algorithmic power curve consumption solution, magic man," says Ava. "I always just sort of choose them by, uh, feel." "What do you feel like?" "Uh, a ham sandwich, a banana, and dragon fire," responds Merlok. "That produced a combo with 2% efficiency," says Ava. "This is why we have to actually THINK about and study perfec Combos. We need automatic power integration." The Knights must stop Jestro from rotting all the food and living plant matter in Knighton and Axl leads the charge. But as they finally confront Jestro, who's trying to rot a field of beans near Fruitbridge, they're hit by his finally completed ROLLING HQ (the Sculptor is proud of the "artsy" elements.) ... it's not exactly perfect though ... he took the idea of Head Quarter a little too litteral and created a big head. Finally, in this conclusive battle where the knights get strapped on a rotting bridge, Clay emerges in a sleek, new BATTLE SUIT that Robin built for him because he was starting to have trouble moving around (the whole turning to stone thing.) It's smaller and more high-tech than the bigger Mechs of the past. Clay's able to drive Jestro off. Jestro, at the end of the episode, puts the Forbidden Power of Ravaging Rot into Mount Thunderstrox. Meanwhile, back at the Fortrex, Axl makes an organic food feast for all his fellow Knights.

programme.title: Rise Of The Snakes
programme.desc: The four Ninja are snapped out of their post-hero complacency when Lord Garmadon's young son Lloyd shows up and tries to pick up where his father left off. The Ninja dismiss him as a threat, but regret that choice after Lloyd wakes up the evil snake tribe. A prophecy is revealed that states a green ninja will ultimately defeat Lord Garmadon.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 1 - Episode 101
programme.desc: When Jestro the Jester finds the Book of Monsters, chaos breaks loose in the Kingdom of Knighton. Can the newly graduated Knights from the Knights' Academy save the kingdom? It's final graduation fighting exams for the latest Knights from Knights' Academy. All our new Knights demonstrate their prowess: CLAY, AARON, AXL and LANCE. PRINCESS MACY get to join them, but her father doesn't want her to graduate. As part of the entertainment, MERLOK does an amazing magic trick. His act is followed by...JESTRO, the King's Jester. He's terrible (and he should know to never follow a better act.) Everyone laughed because he's a real joke....a total failure. While Jestro roams the halls fo the King's Castle, forlorn, he hears the BOOK OF MONSTERS calling to him from Merlok's library. The book talks Jestro into gathering as many books of spells as he can carry, but they're interrupted by...Clay! As Jestro quickly pages through the Book of Monsters to attack Clay, Merlok arrives. There's a battle in the library between Jestro and Merlok. Finally, the wizard summons up his most powerful spell in self-defence. BOOM! There's a big, magical explosion and when Clay forces his way back into the library, Merlok, Jestro and the magic books are...GONE!

programme.title: New Girl In Town - Episode 1
programme.desc: When the World Petacular comes to Heartlake City and is almost ruined before it's even started, five feisty girls unite, despite their differences, using their creativity to save the day. Best friends Olivia, Andrea, Emma, Mia and Stephanie reside in HeartLake City but didn't know each other - that is until the World Petacular brought them together! On the eve of the biggest event Heartlake City hosts, disaster and chaos is abound. New-in-town Olivia is helping her veterinarian Aunt Sophie with her mobile clinic. But when she's put in charge of training a scruffy puppy named Scarlet, the puppy runs amuck, leaving a trail of destruction as she collides with Andrea, ruins Emma's banner and Stephanie's cakes, and finally spooks Mia's horse Bella who bucks Mia off and sprints away. The girls quickly unite, helping each-other to save the day and most importantly have fun along the way!

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Back in training mode with the looming threat of Lloyd and the Hypnobrai, Zane wanders after a Falcon and lands himself in a heap of trouble. The rest of the Ninja leave the training dojo to help him and return to find that the snakes have burned it to the ground.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 2 - Episode 102
programme.desc: Realizing they must defend the Kingdom from Jestro's monsters, the Knights try to organize but are despondent when they discover their best advisor - Merlok the Magician - has sacrificed himself to save them. When Jestro awakens, he's been blasted miles and miles away from the King's Castle by Merlok's explosive spell. And, it seems, all the books he was trying to steal have been scattered, too. The Book of Monsters broke Jestro' fall and now he can use the book to attack the people who laughed at him. Meanwhile, the King and his newly-trained Knights pick through the rubble of Merlok's library. They'll have to figure something out, because Jestro and his newly made magic monsters attack King's Castle! Clay organizes the Knights to defend the kingdom, but they've never worked together before. It takes all their training, plus the help of an old friend...MERLOK! Only now he's MERLOK 2.0. Ava has been piecing together what happened and discovering that the "ghost in the machine" she's been chasing is really Merlok in digital form. Now, he can use his magic digitally and he downloads just the right weapons to the struggling Knights! They finally foil Jestro's attack with Merlok's help and officially become NEXO KNIGHTS!

programme.title: Stephanie's Surprise Party -Episode 2
programme.desc: When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they soon discover that it's not easy keeping their plans secret from Stephanie who becomes suspicious when none of the girls have time to hang out. When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they discover that it's not easy keeping their plans a secret. As the girls choreograph a dance routine, magic show and search for the perfect present and cake, Stephanie becomes aware that her friends are avoiding her on her birthday and excluding her from their activities... Little does she know that her friends are secretly preparing a surprise pool party for her! Once the surprise is revealed Stephanie realises how much her friends care about her and the importance of friendship.

programme.title: Snakebit
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe - The Fangpyres - to help him regain control. The Ninja are busy setting up their new HQ that Zane discovered, but are called to duty when the Fangpyres attack the village where Jay's family lives.

programme.title: The Power Of Merlok - Episode 103
programme.desc: When Jestro attacks a village on the far side of the Kingdom, the NEXO-Knights wonder how they'll get there. Then Macy remembers her dad has a royal RV...maybe they can "mod" that for their own, "knightly" use? Now the NEXO-Knights get rolling...in THE FORTREX, their own ROLLING CASTLE! This great new HQ, which houses Merlok 2.0 as an operating system, will be how the knights move around Knighton and protect it from Jestro and his monsters. Speaking of the evil jester, in this episode Jestro uses some newly-made monsters to attack a town far from the capitol where he thinks he's safe from the Knights' reach. We see two parallel stories here: the Knights training, learning more about digital magic and getting organized as a team and at the same time we see Jestro making monsters, trying to learn how his powers work and talking to the Book. In the end, the Knights roll up in their castle and defeat Jestro and his marauding monsters. Lance thinks he should be the leader because he's a snot. "Of course I'm the leader...I'm a Richmond."

programme.title: Dolphin Cruise -Episode 3
programme.desc: Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a science contest at school and win a trip on a luxury yacht but not everything goes as planned when they set out to sea. When Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a school science contest and win a Dolphin sight-seeing trip, not everything goes to plan...As the girls set out to sea on a luxury yacht, misunderstandings and disagreements occur which become secondary when they discover a pod of dolphins in danger. The girls learn that they have to compromise and trust in each other if they are to save the dolphins and their trip out to sea...

programme.title: Never Trust A Snake
programme.desc: After the Fangpyres join forces with the Hypnobrai, Lloyd awakens Pythor - the last remaining snake of the Anacondrai tribe. Pythor lures Lloyd under his spell and steals a map from him that will show him where the remaining two snakes tribes dwell and Uncle Sensei saves Lloyd from doom.

programme.title: The Knights Code - Episode 104
programme.desc: Jestro uses the Book of Chaos to unleash, um, chaos and attack the King's hover train to try and kidnap the royal party. Can the NEXO-Knights bring order out of the chaos and save the King? Jestro finds the Book of Chaos in the countryside and decides he must feed it to the book. The Book of Monsters actually tells Jestro NOT to feed it to him he tells Jestro he's not ready for that kind of power. But Jestro doesn't listen. Now the Book unleashes chaotic monsters and Jestro uses them to attack the King and his party who are on a business-related tour of the kingdom. When the NEXO-Knights show up to stop the monster attacks and realize that they must save King and Queen Halbert - Macy's parents - from the chaotic evil monsters that have been unleashed. Clay asserts himself as leader and brings order to the knights from the chaos. He has his own book: the Book of the Knight's Code. They should all live by it.

programme.title: Country Girls - Episode 4
programme.desc: When the girls go to Mia's grandparents' ranch and Olivia accidentally knocks down the neighbor's barn, the girls promise to raise money to rebuild it and now have to learn to set aside their differences and work together to make good on their promise. Mia invites her friends to her grandparents' ranch for the weekend. But when Olivia accidentally knocks down a neighbor's barn with a tractor, the girls promise to raise the money to rebuild it themselves. Complicating matters, Mia and Stephanie turn out to like the same boy, Martin. They'll have to learn to set aside their differences and work together if they're going to raise enough money to make good on their promise.

programme.title: The Snake King
programme.desc: Pythor declares himself to be the destined leader who will reawaken The Great Devourer - an ancient beast who can't be killed and will consume all of Ninjago. We find out Nya is the Samurai and Lloyd is taken prisoner by the snake tribes.

programme.title: Fright Knight - Episode 105
programme.desc: Using the Book of Fear, Jestro calls forth Whipperella and uses her to trap the knights in the dark woods where they realize their darkest fears. Searching through the dark forests of the realm, Jestro finds "The Book of Fear." It's pretty scary. But he feeds it to the book of Book of Monsters, and he uses it to call forth WHIPPERELLA, a monster that can induce fear. One-by-one she uses her "knighmarish" power on the knights and they experiences their own worst fears. Clay fears not living up to the Knights' Code. Lance fears being a nobody. Macy fears never being a knight and Axl fears having no food. Aaron must take the lead because he's fearless he does everything with reckless abandon. It's not until he leads the group out of the forest - as they fight off the Whipperella - that they we find out Aaron's true fear - the fear of peace and quiet and no more challenges or high energy escapades.

programme.title: Emma's Dilemma - Episode 5
programme.desc: When Stephanie becomes obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in a float building contest and accidentally disregards Emma's ideas and design, Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to get revenge on Stephanie. When the girls enter a float-building contest, Emma is especially excited to share her design idea for the float. But no one is listening to her, especially Stephanie, who's become obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in the contest. Emma finally does find someone who appreciates her design... Tanya! Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to build the float design. But is Tanya just using Emma to get revenge on Stephanie?

programme.title: Tick Tock
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: The Golden Castle - Episode 106
programme.desc: When Lance is cast as the star in the new remake of the classic movie "Ned Knightly and the Golden Castle" he doesn't anticipate Jestro and his monsters invading the set and ruining his starring role. It's movie time! Lance does something very Lance: he agrees to star in a movie about remake of a classic film in Knighton: "The Golden Castle." While pillaging a village, Jestro and the Book of Monsters see a movie poster for "The Golden Castle" and the book says the legendary Golden Castle is filled with riches! Jestro explains that it's just a dumb movie and that it's not real. It's all based on a "script." The Book, who's been shelved for many years, wants to eat the movie script to learn more about the modern world. On the set of the movie, Lance has invited the other Knights to act as extras. When they see how Lance is being portrayed, they're incensed. When Jestro attacks the movie set to get the script for his book to eat, the film director keeps rolling. This battle footage is fantastic! The Knights defeat Jestro even though the movie set is trashed. The director will make it work. At the premier of the movie, Lance is embarrassed to see that he's been reduced to comic relief for the realm's bravest Knight...Macy! The director has now made her a star.

programme.title: Friends Of The Jungle - Episode 6
programme.desc: When Olivia's Aunt Sophie is getting married and the groom has gone missing in the jungle, the girls fly out to the jungle in secret to try to find him in time for the wedding. The girls are super excited to be planning a wedding for Olivia's Aunt Sophie. There's just one little problem: Olivia learns that the groom has gone missing in the jungle while working at an animal rescue station! Not wanting to worry her aunt, Olivia, Stephanie and Mia secretly fly to the jungle to try and find the groom, Henry, rescuing a few animals along the way. Too bad Emma and Andrea couldn't keep the secret back in Heartlake City. Now, Sophie, Emma and Andrea join the others in the jungle to try and find Henry before the rapidly approaching wedding date!

programme.title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

programme.title: HobbyKidsTV | Trust the Challenge!
programme.desc: Come along for the fun with popular YouTube family, HobbyKidsTV! Plus, HobbyKids Adventures!

programme.title: EvanTubeHD | Evan's Food Fight!
programme.desc: Share in the fun with YouTube star EvanTubeHD, his sister JillianTubeHD, and the whole Tube Family!

programme.title: HobbyKidsTV | Mystery Circle Saga!
programme.desc: Come along for the fun with popular YouTube family, HobbyKidsTV! Plus, HobbyKids Adventures!

programme.title: Challenge Squad | Fried Popcorn?!
programme.desc: Challenge Squad takes on the most epic challenges, featuring your favorite YouTube stars!

programme.title: HobbyKidsTV | Minecraft Dungeons!
programme.desc: Come along for the fun with popular YouTube family, HobbyKidsTV! Plus, HobbyKids Adventures!

programme.title: EvanTubeHD | Tube Family Fun!
programme.desc: Share in the fun with YouTube star EvanTubeHD, his sister JillianTubeHD, and the whole Tube Family!

programme.title: HobbyKidsTV | Froggy Friends!
programme.desc: Come along for the fun with popular YouTube family, HobbyKidsTV! Plus, HobbyKids Adventures!

programme.title: JillianTubeHD | Jillian vs. A Yeti!
programme.desc: Join YouTube star, JillianTubeHD, as she makes everything from delicious desserts to gold, glittery slime!

programme.title: HobbyKidsTV | Mystery Circle Saga!
programme.desc: Come along for the fun with popular YouTube family, HobbyKidsTV! Plus, HobbyKids Adventures!

programme.title: Camp Spoopy
programme.desc: Pumpkins, goblins and candy...and a puppy in a ghost costume?! Stay right here on Camp Spoopy for all your Halloween craze, all October long!

programme.title: LOL Block
programme.desc: LOL Block: A crazy collection of hilarious comedy series featuring shows like “Space Yogurt, “Ivick Von Salza”, “Om Nom Stories” and “Karl”.

programme.title: Gross Out TV
programme.desc: Gross Out TV: Get ready for the weirdest, grossest, slimiest shows of all time, like “Bob The Slob”, “Horace In Slow Motion", and “Fleabag Monkeyface”.

programme.title: KikoRiki
programme.desc: Round shaped funny creatures live in a beautiful fairy-tale land of Kikoriki. Each of them has its own personality and each story teaches valuable lessons about cooperation, creativity, core values, self-acceptance, support and communication.

programme.title: Pincode
programme.desc: Grown up Kikoriki characters rock the world with their scientific superpowers and tell the kids scientific facts in a most entertaining way. The crew follows Captain Pin as they learn about the world we live in and share this knowledge with us.

programme.title: Newbie and The Disasternauts
programme.desc: In the far future, 10 year-olds can buy experiences as easily as today's kids buy video games. Newbie decides to spend his money on a trip to outer space. Unfortunately, Newbie crashes his trip, and now he is lost in space!

programme.title: Everybody Loves a Moose
programme.desc: An oddball buddy series between an over ambitious boy, Jack and his pal Moose, a melodramatic self-confessed expert in everything. Except he isn't!

programme.title: Gummibar & Friends - The Gummy Bear Show
programme.desc: Gummy lives in an apartment with his friend Harry the Chameleon, while his other friend Kala the Cat hangs out in a ninja dojo on the roof. Together they go on wild and wacky adventures in their building and hometown. Enjoy the fun and crazy adventures!

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends
programme.desc: Things get even more epic in Season 3 as Talking Tom and Friends try new ways to make their dreams come true, making more friends (and enemies) along the way!

programme.title: Music Box
programme.desc: Music Box - Get ready to dance and sing-along to music-filled episodes of “Badanamu Pop Videos”, “The Beet Party”, “Storybots” and “SpacePOP”.

programme.title: Zig & Sharko
programme.desc: Zig, a famished hyena comes up with the craziest plans to make a meal out of Marina, the carefree mermaid. But that’s forgetting all about Sharko, the muscly shark who will do anything to protect her!

programme.title: Fuzzy Tales
programme.desc: An all new take on some classic tales starring the cutest baby animals you have ever seen! A captivating blend of live action animals and beautiful animated backgrounds, Fuzzy Tales offers a fresh approach to mixed media that is adorably irresistible

programme.title: Blue Bagoo and Friends
programme.desc: Nursery rhymes, kids songs, and much more! Welcome to Blue Bagoo & Friends!

programme.title: Brain Candy TV
programme.desc: Early learning for a brighter future! Your children will love to learn their ABCs, numbers, colors and even some math and science with the help of our action-packed vehicles including monster trucks, dump trucks, trains and more, plus our cute dog Lizzy.

programme.title: Ping and Friends
programme.desc: Follow Ping and her friends as they find musical inspiration in unlikely places!

programme.title: Wonderballs! Let's Get Rolling!
programme.desc: Have some laughs and make some crafts with the Wonderballs! These rolling, rollicking friends love creating art new and imaginative ways! They'll also show you how you can do it at home!

programme.title: The Day Henry Met
programme.desc: Everyday Henry meets something new - The day Henry met a Whale! The day Henry met the Moon!, The day Henry met a Car! How exciting, I wonder what Henry's going to meet today?

programme.title: Cloud Babies
programme.desc: Cloud Babies is about four toddlers, Baba Pink, Baba Blue, Baba Yellow, and Baba Green whose job is to look after the sky and their Sky Friends, Sun, Moon, Rainbow, Fluffa Cloud and Little Star.

programme.title: Berry and Dolly
programme.desc: Berry, the little snail boy and Dolly, the ladybird are best friends. Together they discover the world around them, while they make new friends with Balthazar the bee, Flutter the butterfly, Stanley the stag-beetle, Leapy the grasshopper, and many others.

programme.title: Awesome Animals
programme.desc: Awesome Animals: We’ve got all of your favorite animals rights here from furry creatures to fierce dinos. Series featured are: “ZooMooPedia”, “Dinostory”, “ Lubinho, “Bath Time” and “Eddie Is A Yeti”.

programme.title: Bino & Fino
programme.desc: Bino & Fino is about a brother and sister named Bino and Fino who live with their grandparents 'Mama' and 'Papa' in a modern day city in Africa. Bino and Fino have many adventures where, with the help of their friend Zeena the Magic Butterfly, they discover and learn things about the world.

programme.title: The Day Henry Met
programme.desc: Everyday Henry meets something new - The day Henry met a Whale! The day Henry met the Moon!, The day Henry met a Car! How exciting, I wonder what Henry's going to meet today?

programme.title: Sing-Along Songs
programme.desc: Sing-Along Songs: Sing-along with your fun favorites as well as some new songs that will make you dance. Episodes include such series as Storybots, Badanamu Pop Videos, Como POP, DJ Monkey, Urban Tails, Fluffy's Rhyme Time, Dance Fever and ZooMoo Groove.

programme.title: Bubu and the Little Owls
programme.desc: Follow the adorable adventures of Bubu, a curious and energetic young owl who is always in a hurry to explore the world outside her shell!

programme.title: TOONBO
programme.desc: TOONBO SING 2 LEARN is a series of educational animated videos with songs that teach ABCs, counting and numbers, basic addition, and days of the week!

programme.title: Raggs
programme.desc: Raggs stars five members of a canine band, Raggs, Trilby, Pido, B. Max and Razzles, and their wise-cracking pet cat, Dumpster, who learn life lessons together in their own cool clubhouse.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V!: An Academic Test
programme.desc: The secret behind Yuya's dad's disappearance is finally revealed!

programme.title: Cosmic Quantum Ray: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Quantum Ray poses as the school bus driver for Robbie and the Science Clubs field trip, however, the bus winds up captured at Area 52, where government agents intend to imprison Team Quantum!

programme.title: Grossology: Frankenbooger
programme.desc: Sloppy Joe, the world's filthiest villain returns, and this time he's not alone.

programme.title: Supa Strikas: Tough Luck
programme.desc: Things go horribly wrong en route to Hydra's floating stadium when Twisting Tigers' lucky charm is flung into the ocean! After a terrible game against Hydra, Supa Strikas set out to recover the charm.

programme.title: Mortified: School Trivia Night
programme.desc: Taylor is heartened to realize that she's not alone, as Leon admits he's also a victim of parental embarrassment.

programme.title: Mortified: Taylor's Self-Portrait
programme.desc: Taylor is humiliated when her revealing self-portrait is auctioned at the school, but things get even worse when she discovers her diary has fallen into a stranger's hands.

programme.title: Jacob Two Two: Jacob Two-Two and the Purloined Hockey Card
programme.desc: Jacob receives a Gummer Gormley hockey card from his Dad he decides that this is the lucky charm his hockey team needs to end its losing streak.

programme.title: The Adventures of Bottle Top Bill: The New Scarecrow / Old Lightning
programme.desc: Sandy thinks he is not a very good scarecrow so decides to run away from the farm. / When Mr. Puffer announces the old steam train is going to be used as scrap metal, Bill and Corky decide to restore

programme.title: PopPixie: The Last Gnome
programme.desc: A very powerful Talisman, which can turn all the Gnomes into stone, falls down from the sky in Pixieville!

programme.title: PopPixie: The Elves' Underground Assault
programme.desc: Rex and his Elves' gang develop the umpteenth plan to rob Pixieville's bank: thanks to the ravenous Molesaurs, digging creatures that live in the city underground, they'll be able to open a hole in th

programme.title: Everybody Loves a Moose: Hot Air Balloon / Cow Blues / Ghost Ship
programme.desc: Jack's guarding Uncle Schnitzler's hot air balloon while he takes tea with the Duchess. / Farmer McGrim tells Jack that if he can get his stubborn cow, Bessie, back to the farm by sundown, he can ride with her on the Old Timers Carnival float. / Jack's hunting the ghost ship that arrives every one hundred years, with Captain Kidd and his parrot on board.

programme.title: Counting With Paula: One-Armed Cactus
programme.desc: Paula bought a cactus for Tim and herself, but she lost the one she bought for him. They decide to travel to the desert to find this one-armed cactus.

programme.title: Counting With Paula: The Eighth Crystal
programme.desc: Paula borrowed a box set of eight crystals from Mr. Astronaut who visited her school. Unfortunately, she lost one crystal. Paula and friends decide to travel to the 8th planet from the sun to find the

programme.title: Bananas In Pyjamas: Rat and the Jelly / The Dragon's Egg
programme.desc: Rat desperately wants the delicious jellies the Bananas have made for Bernard and he’ll use every trick he knows to get one.

programme.title: PAW Patrol: Pup Tales: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save The Yoga Goats / Pups Save Bedtime / Pups Save Chickalettas Egg / Mighty Pups Super Paws: When Super Kitties Attack / Pups Save a Manatee
programme.desc: Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert!

programme.title: PAW Patrol: Pup Tales

programme.title: Wildlife Savers
programme.desc:
Wildlife Savers is a documentary film about an extraordinary journey: 500 elephants will be moved to a new home in Malawi. This is one of the largest and most significant elephant translocations in human history. Due to poaching, habitat loss and human-wildlife conflict, elephants are being decimated across Africa. 'Wildlife Savers' however, is a different story - one of hope and restoration and of securing the future for Malawi's elephants.
Although Malawi has a relatively peaceful history, the country sees increasing conflict between wildlife and people. Heavily armed poachers are prevalent, harvesting illegal ivory from the remaining elephants, which have been reduced by half from 4,000 to around 2,000 in only twenty years. The "Wildlife Savers" of African Parks resist the onslaught, committing their lives to stemming the violence. What enables them to persevere in their determination to bring about change? Will this, one of the largest elephant relocations in human history, be the solution for elephants and humans in the region?

Director Deborah S. Esquenazi transcends her role as a filmmaker, becoming an investigator alongside attorneys at The Innocence Project.

programme.title: Maynard
programme.desc: Director Sam Pollard constructs a portrait of charismatic trailblazer Maynard Jackson, who became Atlanta’s first black mayor. The son of pastors raised in the segregated South, Jackson entered college at 14 and took office at 35. During his three-term tenure, he led the city through the traumatic Atlanta child murders and triumphantly hosted the 1996 Olympics, all while championing racial equality.

programme.title: Beautifully Insecure
programme.desc: Imagine falling in love with someone but not being able to love yourself. Leanna was diagnosed with Alopecia at age 7 and by 9 years of age all of her hair was gone. By her early 20's her insecurities had such a grip on her heart that she became a master of hiding her hair loss. It wasn't until she met Terrence, the love of her life, that she felt she couldn't hide it any longer. As their love grew, the pressure to tell Terrence about her hair loss did also. Thinking that was more than she could bare she realized GOD had Terrence in her life for more than just companionship. If she only knew she's in for a big surprise.
